intro: Mouse Trap delivers cheesy, nostalgic fun for all the family! The classic childhood game arrives on Nintendo Switch™ with more customisation, modes and cheese!
description:
Stop what you’re fonduing – Mouse Trap is back with a snap!

Choose your mouse, your outfit and get ready for the cheesiest race of your life!

Strategise on the fly as you pick up cheese, steal cheese, and win with the most cheese! Need to slow down another player? Activate the mouse trap and watch the famous chain reaction unfold!

Will it work? Only one way to find out!

At the end of every game, the cheese you earn is added to your hoard. Use your hard-earned cheese to unlock even more outfits for your mouse, and get ready to show off your new look in the next game!

Ready? Set? Go!

FEATURES:
- MULTIPLE MODES – Bring your friends and family together for a race to collect all the cheese!
- DRESS UP YOUR MOUSE – Choose your favourite colour! Pick from red, blue, yellow and green mice, then add your favourite outfit to bring your mouse to life.
- ONLINE AND OFFLINE PLAY – Play against epic A.I. opponents in Single Player Mode, challenge your friends, head online to face fans around the world, or use Pass & Play Mode and simply pass the controller between players!
- UNLOCK MORE OUTFITS – At the end of every game, the cheese you have is added to your hoard. Use your cheese to unlock new outfits!

Race into the colourful, fun and immersive world of Mouse Trap today. It’s as fun as only cheese can brie!
